tool_description: Creates and manages network security groups, firewall rules, and access control policies for server infrastructure protection.

inbound_rules.description: Inbound traffic rules in format: protocol:port:source_cidr

outbound_rules.description: Outbound traffic rules in format: protocol:port:destination_cidr

default_action.description: Default action for unmatched traffic: allow, deny

log_traffic.description: Enable traffic logging for security monitoring

allowed_countries.description: ISO country codes for geo-blocking (e.g., US, CA, GB)

rate_limit_per_ip.description: Maximum requests per minute per IP address

error_messages: Invalid rule format: Use protocol:port:cidr format (e.g., tcp:80:0.0.0.0/0).
Invalid protocol: Use one of [tcp, udp, icmp, all].
Port out of range: Ports must be between 1 and 65535 or 'all'.
Invalid CIDR notation: Use valid CIDR format (e.g., 192.168.1.0/24).
Invalid default action: Use one of [allow, deny].
Invalid country code: Use ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country codes.
Rate limit out of range: Must be between 1 and 10000 requests per minute.
usage: Define security group name and traffic rules. Optionally enable advanced security features like DDoS protection, WAF, and geo-blocking.

security_group_id.description: Unique identifier for the security group
